Process.short_description: Sequential transformation or development of elements over time.

Operation.short_description: Fundamental pattern of action or change upon elements.

Flow.short_description: Movement or transfer of energy, information, or substance between points.

Cycle.short_description: Recurring pattern of processes returning to initial conditions.

Exchange.short_description: Reciprocal transfer or interaction between systems or elements.

Integration.short_description: Combining or unifying separate elements into coherent whole.

Differentiation.short_description: Separation or specialization of elements from unified whole.

Transformation.short_description: Fundamental change in nature or structure of element or system.

Mediation.short_description: Facilitation of relationship or exchange between different elements.

Regulation.short_description: Maintenance of balance or control within system parameters.

Generation.short_description: Creation or emergence of new elements or patterns.

Dissolution.short_description: Breaking down or return of elements to undifferentiated state.

Adaptation.short_description: Modification of system in response to environmental conditions.

Resonance.short_description: Sympathetic response or alignment between systems or elements.

Catalysis.short_description: Facilitation or acceleration of process without being consumed.

Translation.short_description: Conversion of patterns between different forms or mediums.

Organization.short_description: Arrangement of elements into coherent patterns or structures.

Distribution.short_description: Allocation or spreading of elements across space or system.

Channeling.short_description: Directed flow or transmission through specific pathways.

Reflection.short_description: Mirroring or feedback of patterns between levels of system.

Emergence.short_description: Arising of new properties from interaction of elements.

Containment.short_description: Holding or bounding of elements within defined parameters.

Amplification.short_description: Increase in magnitude or intensity of pattern or process.

Attenuation.short_description: Decrease in magnitude or intensity of pattern or process.

Synchronization.short_description: Alignment of timing or phase between different processes.

Oscillation.short_description: Regular variation between different states or conditions.

Polarization.short_description: Development of opposite or complementary aspects.

Manifestation.short_description: Expression of potential or pattern into actualized form.

Absorption.short_description: Taking in or incorporation of external elements into system.

Transmission.short_description: Transfer of pattern or information between systems.

Filtration.short_description: Selective passage or blocking of elements based on criteria.

Coordination.short_description: Harmonious organization of multiple processes or elements.

Preservation.short_description: Maintenance of pattern or state against entropy.

Evolution.short_description: Progressive development of system through selective change.

Involution.short_description: Return or descent of higher principles into manifestation.
